contents.title: Giffyglyph's Capable Cleric
contents.blurb:
You are a cleric, a conduit of divine power. In a dark and dangerous world, your faith in a higher power keeps you strong. But as you strike out into the world, what kind of cleric will you choose to be?

Are you an attendant, using your divine power to help your allies and share your faith? Are you a zealot, waging holy war against the enemies of your deity? Or are you a herald, spreading your faith to the faithless with words and with weapons?

Whatever your focus, Giffyglyph's Capable Cleric introduces new mechanics, features, and subclasses for your D&D 5e character. Add new 1st-10th level options to your campaign and head out into adventure.
features: Revised rules, features, and mechanics for levels 1-10.
New class resources—use your blessed divinity to spread the world and will of your deity.
Master new spells and expand your cleric powers with an expanded spell list.
New subclasses and subclass options—choose your domain from the very first level.
Recover your strength with a long rest.
Variant dials to customise your playstyle.
